page.title: 15BROOMFIELD HOSPITAL II
page.content: { Broomfield Hospital}is one of the few hospitals that has a{C.A.T.Scanner.} This is a piece of equipment that can tell doctors if you have a{tumour}or or other growth.For example if you kept on getting headaches the doctors would take you to the scanning machine which would scan you and find any {tumours}. In the{x-ray department}they have three different coloured areas,one for your body,one for arms and legs and one for your skull. This is to speed up dealing with suspected broken bones. This department is next door to the reception and casualty areas so badly injured people can receive rapid emergency treatment.
